item.title: First post yo
item.description: Gatsby uses standard React.js components to render pages. When you define a page in the createPages API, you specify its component. Those components, usually called templates, get reused with page-specific data to generate the different pages. Gatsby uses standard React.js components to render pages. When you define a page in the createPages API, you specify its component. Those components, usually called templates, get reused with page-specific data to generate the different pages.
